intro: Psychotria warongloaensis, commonly known as the Warongloaensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the rainforests of Southeast Asia, particularly Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the undergrowth of tropical forests. Due to its unique appearance and ecological role, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
